mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT (name, price, img, point) VALUES (#{name}, #{price}, #{img}, #{point})
mapper.update: UPDATE PRODUCT SET img = #{img}, name = #{name}, point = #{point}, price = #{price}, del_yn = #{delYn} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT PH.id, PH.user_id, PH.product_id, PH.record_date, PH.point, U.name user_name, U.class_num user_class, U.campus user_campus, P.name Product_name FROM POINT_HISTORY PH INNER JOIN USER U ON U.id = PH.user_id INNER JOIN PRODUCT P ON P.id = PH.product_id WHERE PH.category = 3
